{"type":"Insert","index":0,"char":"f"}
----
text/plain
> source{char: "f", id: 0}

{"type":"Insert","index":1,"char":"o"}
----
text/plain
> source{char: "o", id: 1}
> next{left: 0, right: 1}

{"type":"Insert","index":2,"char":"o"}
----
text/plain
> source{char: "o", id: 2}
> next{left: 1, right: 2}
